explains: adj. 政府的；政治的；统治上的

sentences.en: These refugees are taken care of by the combined efforts of the host countries and non-governmental organizations.
sentences.cn: 这些难民得到东道国和非政府组织合力照顾。

sentences.en: To attend a governmental job-training program.
sentences.cn: 参加政府的职业培训计划。

sentences.en: I would propose that scientific archeological expeditions and governmental authorities sell excavated artifacts on the open market.
sentences.cn: 我建议科学的考古考察和政府部门在公开市场上出售出土的文物。
